name: Sistermon Ciel (Awakened)
effect: [On Play] You may place 1 [Sistermon Ciel] from your hand or trash at the bottom of this Digimon's digivolution cards to delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 5 or less. [On Deletion] Return 1 card with [Jesmon], [Huckmon], or [Sistermon] in its name other than [Sistermon Ciel (Awakened)] from your trash to your hand.
